\begin{table}[ht]
\caption{Summary of GENEtic SequencIng Study Hamburg-Davos (GENESIS-HD) cohorts. *\citet{betschart_biostatistical_2024} report the final post-QC sample set of 8351, excluding GIAB, etc.}
\label{tab:cohorts}
\centering
\begin{tabular}{@{}>{\raggedright\arraybackslash}p{1.8cm} >{\raggedright\arraybackslash}p{7cm} >{\raggedright\arraybackslash}p{1.2cm} >{\raggedright\arraybackslash}p{1.2cm} >{\raggedright\arraybackslash}p{2cm}@{}}
\toprule
Study & Description & Pre-QC & Post-QC & Ref \\
\midrule
HCHS & Hamburg City Health Study (HHS) with deep-phenotyping, including multiomics data, comprehensive imaging, functional testing, and outcome data. & 8123 & 7397 & \citet{jagodzinski_rationale_2020} \\
Premature MI & Myocardial infarction at age ≤ 50 years. Young Myocardial Infarction (MIYoung) study, Gutenberg Infarction (GIS), and Biomarkers in Acute Cardiac Care (BACC) study. & 517 & 441 & \citet{neumann_diagnosis_2016} \\
INTERCATH & Invasive coronary angiography, genomic analyses in phenotypes: (i) premature onset of coronary artery disease (CAD), (ii) absence of CAD despite numerous cardiovascular risk factors, and (iii) focal versus diffuse angiographic forms of CAD. & 468 & 405 & \citet{waldeyer_lipid_2017} \\
AFHRI & Atrial Fibrillation with High-Risk Individuals (AFHRI) study. Genomics for lone atrial fibrillation; unexplained atrial fibrillation in the absence of conventional risk factors. & 149 & 108 & \href{https://clinicaltrials.gov/study/NCT05442970}{NCT05442970} \\
GrAPHIC &  Primary dilated cardiomyopathies from the Geno- And PHenotyping of Primary Cardiomyopathy (GrAPHIC) study. & 47 & 46 & \citet{keil_multimodal_2024} \\
GIAB & Genome in a bottle (father/mother/son), replicates & 84 & 81 & \href{https://www.nist.gov/programs-projects/genome-bottle}{NIST GIAB} \\
\midrule
GENSIS- HD & CARDIO-CARE DAVOS & 9388 & 8478* & \citet{betschart_biostatistical_2024} \\
\bottomrule
\end{tabular}
\end{table}
